p: In male diabetic patients, one of many complications is infertility, with around 90% of patients suffering from this rather life-changing effect [ 134]. It appears that testicular weight, sperm count and viability, serum luteinizing hormone (LH), follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH), and testosterone levels are significantly lower in the diabetic mice [ 135]. Interestingly, treatment of these male diabetic mice with 400 mg/kg of the hydroalcoholic extract of Rhus coriaria seeds led to a significant improvement in these parameters [ 135]. These studies show that sumac seeds, in addition to favorably regulating glycemia, also reduces its complications such as the risk of infertility.
